title: Design Open Pit Blast Pattern
description: A drill and blast engineer designs a blast pattern for an open-pit mine to achieve optimal fragmentation for the shovels.

tasks.description: Define the blast polygon area on the current mine plan and import the relevant block model data (e.g., rock type, hardness).
tasks.expected_outcome: The area to be blasted is defined, and its rock properties are understood.

tasks.description: Design the blast pattern, specifying drillhole diameter, spacing, burden, and depth.
tasks.expected_outcome: An efficient drill pattern is designed for the rock conditions.

tasks.description: Design the charging plan (explosive type and amount per hole) and the initiation timing sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe and effective charging and timing plan is created to control vibration and fragmentation.
